description: This service maps a mobile number to its associated bank account(s) for verification purposes. It ensures compliance and supports seamless banking workflows.
llm_summary: Mobile to Bank AC maps a mobile number to its linked bank account(s), aiding in banking verification, compliance, and fraud prevention.
use_cases: Map a mobile number to its associated bank account(s) for verification.
Ensure compliance with banking regulations during KYC processes.
Support fraud prevention by validating mobile-to-bank account mappings.
Facilitate seamless integration with banking and payment systems.

request_schema.description: Mobile number to map to bank account(s).
User consent for mapping the mobile number to bank account(s).
